attributes.action: Make Car Registration Plate, Driving Licence, Road Tax, Insurance & MOT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Issue a Registration plate to the Driver, not the vehicle.
Making the Registration Plate all of the required components for the vehicle to be Legal, would ensure instant Identification of any vehicle not Road Legal.
If any component was missing the Registration plate could be placed on the Police System.
The driver is then the registration plate & not the vehicle. Which is easily transferred between cars. 

This would also eliminate the problems of change of ownership, as no one would leave their registration plate on a car when it is sold.

No driving Licence, no registration Plate. Would stop unlicensed drivers buying and using a vehicle on the road.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
